title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
description: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, the group dialog is not shown. The user should be able to define a group even if the dataset is not defined.
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, the group dialog is not shown.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even if the dataset is not set.
SR:
1. Open the report designer.
2. Add a table report item.
3. Do not set the dataset for the table.
4. Try to create a new table group.
5. Verify that the group dialog is shown and the user is able to define a group even if the dataset is not defined.
